snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg said of the Justice Department’s arguments in favor of a monitor: “I don’t know what experience they have in the streets of New York City.”
abstract: Mayor Michael R Bloomberg criticizes recommendations made by the Justice Department in federal suit over Police Department's stop-and-frisk practices, calling its embrace of a court-appointed monitor a 'terrible idea'.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg said of the Justice Department’s arguments in favor of a monitor: “I don’t know what experience they have in the streets of New York City.”

headline.main: Bloomberg Calls Court Monitor for Police a ‘Terrible Idea’
headline.print_headline: Mayor Calls Court Monitor For the Police a ‘Terrible Idea’
